org.osgi.service.permissionadmin.PermissionInfo

  • Packages that use PermissionInfo 
    Package Description
    org.osgi.service.condpermadmin
    Conditional Permission Admin Package Version 1.1.
    org.osgi.service.permissionadmin
    Permission Admin Package Version 1.2.

    • Uses of PermissionInfo in org.osgi.service.condpermadmin

      Methods in org.osgi.service.condpermadmin that return PermissionInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PermissionInfo[] ConditionalPermissionInfo.getPermissionInfos()
      Returns the Permission Infos for the Permissions in this Conditional Permission Info.
      Methods in org.osgi.service.condpermadmin with parameters of type PermissionInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConditionalPermissionInfo ConditionalPermissionAdmin.addConditionalPermissionInfo(ConditionInfo[] conditions, PermissionInfo[] permissions)
      Deprecated. 
      As of 1.1. Use ConditionalPermissionAdmin.newConditionalPermissionUpdate() instead.
      ConditionalPermissionInfo ConditionalPermissionAdmin.newConditionalPermissionInfo(java.lang.String name, ConditionInfo[] conditions, PermissionInfo[] permissions, java.lang.String access)
      Creates a new ConditionalPermissionInfo with the specified fields suitable for insertion into a ConditionalPermissionUpdate.
      ConditionalPermissionInfo ConditionalPermissionAdmin.setConditionalPermissionInfo(java.lang.String name, ConditionInfo[] conditions, PermissionInfo[] permissions)
      Deprecated. 
      As of 1.1. Use ConditionalPermissionAdmin.newConditionalPermissionUpdate() instead.

    • Uses of PermissionInfo in org.osgi.service.permissionadmin

      Methods in org.osgi.service.permissionadmin that return PermissionInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PermissionInfo[] PermissionAdmin.getDefaultPermissions()
      Gets the default permissions.
      PermissionInfo[] PermissionAdmin.getPermissions(java.lang.String location)
      Gets the permissions assigned to the bundle with the specified location.
      Methods in org.osgi.service.permissionadmin with parameters of type PermissionInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PermissionAdmin.setDefaultPermissions(PermissionInfo[] permissions)
      Sets the default permissions.
      void PermissionAdmin.setPermissions(java.lang.String location, PermissionInfo[] permissions)
      Assigns the specified permissions to the bundle with the specified location.
